props.color: Applies specified color to the control when in an **active** state or **input-value** is **true** - it can be the name of material color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`)
props.dense: Lowers max height of list tiles
props.inactive: If set, the list tile will not be rendered as a link even if it has to/href prop or @click handler
props.inputValue: Controls the **active** state of the item. This is typically used to highlight the component
props.selectable: Allow text selection inside `v-list-item`. This prop uses [user-select](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/user-select)
props.threeLine: Increases list-item height for three lines. This prop uses [line-clamp](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/-webkit-line-clamp) and is not supported in all browsers.
props.twoLine: Increases list-item height for two lines. This prop uses [line-clamp](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/-webkit-line-clamp) and is not supported in all browsers.
props.value: The value used when a child of a [v-list-item-group](/components/list-item-groups).
